name: Kitteh Slide Puzzle
description:
Kitteh Slide is a cute and classic sliding block puzzle game. Simply touch a tile to move it and try to solve the puzzle! There are 25 puzzles to unlock and 5 difficulty levels. Compete for the fastest time, or just for fun.

Can you solve Impossible mode? (Spoiler: Probably not. No one has yet!)

Featuring beautiful art by Anne Pätzke.
